regexCodeList.string: ^You assess the bodily wounds as follows\:$

Trigger.name: Head
Trigger.script:
local t = wound_tracker
for k,v in pairs(wound_colours) do if matches[2] == k then t.h = {wounds = matches[2], name = "H", colour = v} end end

Trigger.name: Close Gate
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("wound_tracker_start", 0) local t = wound_tracker cecho("<"..t.h.colour ..">["..t.h.name .."] ") cecho("<"..t.c.colour ..">["..t.c.name .."] ") cecho("<"..t.g.colour ..">["..t.g.name .."] ") cecho("<"..t.la.colour ..">["..t.la.name .."] ") cecho("<"..t.ra.colour ..">["..t.ra.name .."] ") cecho("<"..t.ll.colour ..">["..t.ll.name .."] ") cecho("<"..t.rl.colour ..">["..t.rl.name .."] ") cecho("\n ")
wound_update() wound_container:show()

Trigger.name: Health
Trigger.script: wound_health_current, wound_health_max = tonumber(matches[2]), tonumber(matches[3]) local percent = math.floor((100/tonumber(matches[3])) * tonumber(matches[2])) wound_hp_bar:setValue(wound_health_current, wound_health_max, percent.."%") wound_bleeding:echo("0") wound_bruising:echo("0")

regexCodeList.string: ^You glance over \w+ and see that \w+ health is at (\d+)\/(\d+)\.$

Timer.name: wound_resize_window
Timer.script:
local x, y = getMousePosition() wound_new_width = windowpositions.wound_width + (x - windowpositions.wound_start_x) wound_new_height = windowpositions.wound_height + (y - windowpositions.wound_start_y)
wound_container:resize(wound_new_width, wound_new_height)

Timer.name: wound_drag_window
Timer.script: local x, y = getMousePosition() windowpositions.wound_x = x windowpositions.wound_y = y table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/windowpositions", windowpositions) wound_container:move(getMousePosition())

Script.name: file_exists
Script.script: function file_exists(name) local f=io.open(name,"r") if f~=nil then io.close(f) return true else return false end end
